hero.title: Get Fuel Delivered
hero.subtext: Never worry about running out of fuel again. Request fuel delivery in seconds and choose from competitive bids from verified drivers.

features.title: Features That Make Us
features.subtext: Experience the future of fuel delivery with our innovative platform designed for convenience and reliability.

items.title: Instant Requests
items.description: Place your fuel request in seconds with our intuitive app interface.

items.title: Competitive Bidding
items.description: Get multiple bids from drivers and choose the best price for you.

items.title: Real-Time Tracking
items.description: Track your fuel delivery in real-time with live GPS updates.

items.title: Verified Drivers
items.description: All drivers are background-checked and verified for your safety.

items.title: 24/7 Availability

items.title: Live Chat Support

howItWorks.title: How It Works for

steps.title: Place Fuel Request
steps.description: Enter your location and fuel requirements. Choose your preferred fuel type and quantity.

steps.title: Get Multiple Bids
steps.description: Receive competitive bids from nearby verified drivers. Compare prices and delivery times.

steps.title: Choose Your Driver
steps.description: Select the driver that best fits your needs. View ratings and estimated arrival time.

steps.title: Track & Receive
steps.description: Track your fuel delivery in real-time. Pay securely through the app after delivery.

steps.title: Rate Experience
steps.description: Rate your driver and help maintain our quality service standards.

forDrivers.title: Start Earning with
forDrivers.subtext: Turn your spare time into income. Join our network of verified drivers and help people get fuel when they need it most.

benefits.title: Earn Extra Income
benefits.description: Set your own rates and accept jobs that work for your schedule. Flexible earning potential.

benefits.title: Flexible Schedule
benefits.description: Work whenever you want. Accept jobs during your free time and be your own boss.

benefits.title: Use Your Vehicle
benefits.description: Use your own vehicle to deliver fuel. No special equipment needed to get started.

benefits.title: Growing Demand
benefits.description: Join a rapidly growing platform with thousands of users requesting fuel daily.

cta.title: Ready to Experience
cta.subtext: Download the Hi-GAS app today and get your first delivery with exclusive introductory pricing.

footer.title: Join the Hi-GAS community
